channel.title: How do i make admins on 508s?
channel.description: i have a 508 but dont no how to make admins i tried to make admins but it just resets the acc plzz help :confused:

item.title: How do i make admins on 508s?
item.dc:creator: @crazzydude49 crazzydude49
item.description:
@crazzydude49 wrote:

can anyone help on i cant find login.java

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make admins on 508s?

item.title: How do i make admins on 508s?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

X_Evil_X:

Go to the server’s source you downloader.Then open"Characters".Then find the character that you want to be an admin,and open w/ notepad.Then select Player rights - 0 to Player Rights - 3.Hope I helped.

508s do not use character files to load the rights and such.

Login.java is your answer.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make admins on 508s?

You Didnt help him at all. he said 508 not 317…

And to crazydude: i believe its in login.java, not sure i havent tryed coding a 508 in a long time
